text: Twenty-four passengers of an air-conditioned omni sleeper bus had a providential escape after the vehicle caught fire on the Tiruchi – Chennai national highway on Monday. The bus was on its way to Chennai from Theni. It left Theni at 8.30 p.m. on Sunday. As it neared Samayapuram toll plaza, smoke emanated from the toilet, sources said. The passengers immediately alighted from the bus after it was stopped. The vehicle caught fire and was completely damaged.
title: Narrow escape for bus passengers
